level.heading: Short title.
level.text: This subchapter may be cited as the "Open Meetings Act".

level.heading: History
level.text: (Oct. 21, 1968, Pub. L. 90-614, title IV, ยง 401, as added Mar. 31, 2011, D.C. Law 18-350, ยง 2, 58 DCR 734.)

level.heading: Section References
level.text: This section is referenced in ยง 1-1161.01 and ยง 31-3171.11.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 18-350
level.text: Law 18-350, the "Open Meetings Amendment Act of 2010", was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 18-716, which was referred to the Committee on Government Operations and the Environment. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on December 7, 2010, and December 21, 2010, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on January 19, 2011, it was assigned Act No. 18-700 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review. D.C. Law 18-350 became effective on March 31, 2011.
